publ: by 深圳市卓悦智能技术有限公司
name: Cloudot
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Cloudot now supporting Alexa! With Cloudot Skill, you can activate your video doorbells and security cameras and watch live video by saying Alexa voice commands.

Before getting started, please follow below steps:
1. Get Cloudot app ready on your smart phone. Log in and add devices into your account.
2. Get the Alexa app on your phone and login.
3. Find Cloudot Skill in Alexa app, click “Enable skill” to link your Cloudot account with your Alexa account.
4. Now you can try out your voice commands. 

For example: 
- “Alexa, show the doorbell!”
- “Alexa, show the indoor camera!”
- “Alexa, stop!”
